VIII.iv.4.B.2.j
.
SMC Under PL 107-330
PL 107-330
, effective December 6, 2002, clarified that loss of one or both breasts includes
loss of 25 percent or more of breast tissue from a single breast or both breasts in combination, and
receipt of radiation treatment of breast tissue.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section B - History of Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
